channel.title: Home on Code Art Gallery
channel.description: Recent content in Home on Code Art Gallery

item.title: The Modern Wizard (with tangent about my limited understanding of metaphysics)
item.description:
What is a wizard?

Essentially, the wizards were believed to be people who were deeply aware of the laws and systems of the world around them.

item.title: Line Art
item.description: It’s a pun, you see. It’s made of many lines stacking over each other.

item.title: Unwelcome
item.description: I don’t know what to call these things. Fish? Birds? Anyway, just click and drag around the screen. Also try to hover over them with your mouse.

item.title: Self
item.description: A picture of me rasterized with circles. They grow and shrink according to a sine function.

item.title: Rorschach
item.description: Named after that psychological test with the ink blots. In a similar way, this piece is a playground of pareidolia.

item.title: Provoke
item.description: Move your mouse around and see the form react. Consider how it might be feeling; read it.

item.title: Weave
item.description: Reminds me of those DVD screensavers. Give it time; the pattern it generates is very cool.

item.title: Anticipation
item.description: An eye-shaped piece. The first piece I ever did.

item.title: Would you believe this site was made in 2020?
item.description: Times have surely changed. I assure you, this site won’t look like that again.
